name: Samurai Standoff
description:
Japan's most valuable musical relics has been stolen by a powerful and rich Yakuza thug. In the middle of the night, four samurais are determined to take it back and bring it to their respective clans. Who will win the stressful and rythmic fight ?

Credits :

Programmers : Tristan Record & Hugo Tuil & Wilhelm Thomaseau

Graphic Artists : Charles Bouyssou & David Vautel

Game Designers : Werner Frenoy & Etienne Dumaire

Sound Designer : Marcus Do Rego

Producer :  Gwladys Salou
